nodes.text: The Thuruht Queen was a Killik queen. She resided in the Celestial Palace on a planet in the Reo system.

In 44 ABY, the Jedi Knights Raynar Thul, Lowbacca, Tekli, and their accompanying protocol droid, C-3PO, personally met with the Thuruht Queen so that they could ask her how to stop Abeloth. As it was the Thuruht nest that had entrapped Abeloth on her prison planet thousands of years before, the Knights had looked to her for information as to how Abeloth could possibly be defeated. When the Knights informed her that Abeloth was loose in the galaxy, the Queen had the entire nest prepare for the end of times.
